[默]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *mlɯːɡ ): phonetic 黑 ( OC *hmlɯːɡ ) + semantic 犬 ( “ dog ” )

[黙]
Japanese shinjitai Simplified from 默 ( 黑 → 黒 ); further, 黒 is split into 里 and 灬 (on the bottom). Compare 点 (from 點 ).
